original_text: But, The Lord liveth, which brought up and which led the seed of the house of Israel out of the north country, and from all countries whither I had driven them; and they shall dwell in their own land.
korean_text: 이스라엘 집 자손을 북쪽 땅, 그 모든 쫓겨났던 나라에서 인도하여 내신 여호와의 사심으로 맹세할 것이며 그들이 자기 땅에 살리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: and which led the seed of the house of Israel
and from all countries whither I had driven them;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그들을 쫓아 보냈던 모든 나라로부터

sentences.original_text: and they shall dwell in their own land.
